body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Benjamin Wilson and the customer's name is Christina Turner.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Benjamin Wilson, and I am with MetaCar, a leading car rental agency. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Benjamin. I'm having a bit of a frustrating experience with my recent rental.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Christina. Can you please tell me a bit more about the issue you're facing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, the car I received doesn't match what I had reserved.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how disappointing that can be. To help you better, could you please provide your reservation number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christina. And could I also have your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for that information. Let me check your reservation details right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I really hope you can sort this out.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I will do my very best, Christina. Thank you for your patience. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Christina. I appreciate it. If you need further assistance, don’t hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
